name: DB SUPER: Full Power
description:
Enjoy the wild battles between all the characters you know! Have fun with all the cool moves!
Incredible gaming experience: turn-based battles, high graphics and well-designed art style, strategic gameplay and interesting story!



1. Fierce combat style faithful to the battles in the anime


2. Choose the warriors you like among plentiful choices and build your own team


3. Fun turn-based battles with cool moves


4. Abundant gears and materials in a variety of maps
